Plot: Hazel and Augustus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous, given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his prosthetic leg, and they meet and fall in love at a cancer support group.
Title: The Fault in Our Stars
Actors: Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Nat Wolff, Laura Dern
Writer: Scott Neustadter (screenplay), Michael H. Weber (screenplay), John Green (book)
